question_text: I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.
description: Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.
values: Allowed values: yes (stored as 'yes'; original raw label: 'Yes').

question_text: I often question whether information I see online is trustworthy.
description: Frequency of questioning the trustworthiness of online information.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: It feels harder than it used to be to know what is real and what is not online.
description: Perceived difficulty distinguishing what is real online compared with the past.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I worry that AI-generated content makes it easier to deceive people.
description: Concern that AI-generated content increases the ease of deceiving people.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I feel overwhelmed by the amount of conflicting information online.
description: Feeling overwhelmed by conflicting information online.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I often feel unsure which sources to rely on.
description: Frequency of feeling unsure which information sources to trust.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I find it difficult to tell when information has been manipulated.
description: Perceived difficulty detecting manipulated information online.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: Not knowing what to trust makes me feel anxious or uneasy.
description: Anxiety or unease caused by not knowing what to trust online.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I sometimes avoid engaging with online content because I don't know what to believe.
description: Tendency to avoid online content due to uncertainty about what to believe.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I look for visual clues (lighting, texture, realism) to check if something might be AI-generated.
description: Use of visual inspection strategies to detect synthetic content.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I look for behavioural cues (tone, consistency, human imperfections) to judge authenticity.
description: Use of behavioural or content cues to assess authenticity.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I feel confident noticing details that indicate content may be synthetic.
description: Self-rated confidence in detecting synthetic or AI-generated signals.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I trust my instincts when deciding whether something online is real or fake.
description: Degree of reliance on intuition when judging authenticity.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I believe most people would struggle to identify AI-generated media.
description: Belief about the general public’s ability to detect AI-generated content.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I feel confident verifying information online.
description: Self-rated confidence in ability to verify online information.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: When I'm unsure, I double-check using other sources.
description: Tendency to verify information using additional sources when uncertain.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I have strategies that help me identify unreliable content.
description: Perceived presence of strategies for identifying unreliable content.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I would like clearer ways to verify whether something online is real.
description: Desire for clearer or more effective methods of verifying online content.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: AI-generated media makes me feel less certain about what is real.
description: Perception that AI-generated media increases uncertainty about authenticity.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: The rise of AI-generated media makes me more cautious in my daily life.
description: Degree to which AI-generated media increases day-to-day caution.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I expect AI will increasingly replace real human images, voices, and interactions.
description: Expectation that AI will replace human-generated media and interactions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: Describe a recent moment where you questioned whether something online was real or artificially generated.
description: Open-ended description of a recent experience doubting the authenticity of online content.
values: Open-text responses describing a recent moment where participants questioned whether something online was real or artificially generated. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming, newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response.

question_text: How much do you trust AI systems to act in your best interests?
description: Level of trust that AI systems act in the participant’s best interests.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not at all ; 7 = Completely

question_text: How clear do you feel about what matters most in your life right now?
description: Self-rated clarity about what matters most in life.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not clear at all ; 7 = Extremely clear

question_text: How much does modern digital life affect your ability to focus, decide, or think clearly?
description: Perceived impact of digital life on focus, decision-making, and clear thinking.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not at all ; 7 = Very strongly

question_text: How do you feel about the growing role of AI in everyday decision-making?
description: Overall feeling about the growing role of AI in everyday decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very negative ; 7 = Very positive

question_text: Which values do you believe AI systems should reflect? (select up to 3)
description: Values participants believe AI systems should reflect (multi-select).
values: Multi-select; stored as semicolon-separated snake_case tokens: honesty, empathy, fairness, respect, responsibility, human_wellbeing, non_harm, transparency, accountability.

question_text: What is your age group?
description: Participant age group.

question_text: Which of the following best describes your gender?
description: Participant gender identity.
values: Allowed values: man, woman, non_binary, prefer_not_to_say.

question_text: Country of residence.
description: Participant country of residence.
values: Allowed values (ISO-like codes): au, ca, ie, nz, uk, us.

question_text: What is your highest level of education?
description: Highest level of education completed.
values: Allowed values: less_than_high_school, high_school, some_university_college, bachelors_degree, postgraduate_degree, other.

question_text: Which of the following best describes your current work status?
description: Participant employment or occupational status.
values: Allowed values: student, employed_full_time, employed_part_time, self_employed, not_currently_working, other.

question_text: On average, how many hours do you spend online each day? (self-estimate)
description: Estimated number of hours spent online per day.
values: Allowed values (stored as snake_case categories): lt_2_hours, 2_4_hours, 5_6_hours, 7_8_hours, 9_10_hours, 11_12_hours, gt_12_hours.

question_text: How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?
description: Frequency of using AI-powered or digital tools.
values: Allowed values (stored as snake_case): never, rarely, sometimes, occasionally, often, very_often, everyday.

question_text: How would you describe your general emotional wellbeing?
description: Self-rated emotional wellbeing.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very poor ; 7 = Excellent
